analyzed: cetayita lakkhaṇā mahā rāja cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇā ca ati

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso visaṁ abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya, so attanāpi dukkhito bhaveyya, parepi dukkhitā bhaveyyuṁ;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ visam abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya pare ca pāyeyya saḥ attanā api dukkhitaḥ bhaveyya pare api dukkhitāḥ bhaveyyu

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, idhekacco puggalo akusalaṁ kammaṁ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja idha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ akusalam kammam cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjeyya

original: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: ye pi tassa anusikkhanti te pi kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kocideva puriso sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitaṁ ekajjhaṁ
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ sappi navanīta tela madhu phāṇitam ekajjha

original: abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya, so attanā sukhito bhaveyya, parepi sukhitā bhaveyyuṁ;
analyzed: abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya pare ca pāyeyya saḥ attanā sukhitaḥ bhaveyya pare api sukhitāḥ bhaveyyu

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, idhekacco puggalo kusalaṁ kammaṁ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja idha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ kusalam kammam cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: ye pi tassa anusikkhanti te pi kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti

original: Evaṁ kho, mahārāja, cetayitalakkhaṇā cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā cā”ti.
analyzed: evam kho mahā rāja cetayita lakkhaṇā cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇā ca ati
